name: Quasar (itch) (6TeenBits)
description:
Space... infinite and beautiful.
Having started playing small pieces of stone, all gaining and gaining weight
reach the stage of the planet, the sun, neutron stars...

-

Space adventure game. You need to "evolved" from the asteroid to the black hole. You will find 7 evolutionary stages, with their, unique gameplay.

-
